org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components

Class RiderPose

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.BaseComponent
      • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.RiderPose
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeSetOwner

    public class RiderPose
extends BaseComponent
    The rider pose controls the posture of the stick figure on the bicycle. All the general rotations of extremities can be specified (foot, ankle, arm, wrist). The rotation of components can also be specified (pedals and cranks). The out of saddle offset is stored here also.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.BaseComponent

    • Method Detail

      • getCrankRotation

        public double getCrankRotation()
        Get the crank rotation in degrees. This is the rotation of the cranks. Positive values are clockwise (the natural stroke direction).
        Returns:
        The crank rotation in degrees.

      • getPedalRotation

        public double getPedalRotation()
        Get the the pedal rotation in degrees. This is the rotation of the pedals on their axis.
        Returns:
        The pedal rotation in degrees.

      • getToeAngle

        public double getToeAngle()
        Get the toe angle in degrees. This is the bend at the ball of the foot.
        Returns:
        The toe angle in degrees.

      • getWristBend

        public double getWristBend()
        Get the wrist bend in degrees. This is the bend at the wrist in relation to the arm.
        Returns:
        The wrist bend in degrees.

      • getArmBend

        public double getArmBend()
        Get the arm bend in degrees. This is the bend in the elbow.
        Returns:
        The arm bend in degrees.

      • getHandleBarPosition

        public HandleBarPosition getHandleBarPosition()
        Get the handlebar position. This is the selector for multiple hand positions (if the handlebar has multiple positions).
        Returns:
        Th handlebar position.

      • getSaddlePosition

        public SaddlePosition getSaddlePosition()
        Get the saddle position. This is the controller for seated or out of saddle.
        Returns:
        The saddle position.

      • getOutOfSaddlePoint

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getOutOfSaddlePoint()
        Get the out of saddle position. This point is an offset from the bottom bracket (bottom bracket not factored in here).
        Returns:
        The out of saddle point.

      • updateGeometry

        public void updateGeometry()
        There is no geometry in the rider pose.
        Specified by:
        updateGeometry in class BaseComponent
